pages.title: Ritual Note
pages.text: Craft yourself a rune ritual note using the provided recipe. This will explain how to properly setup and preform a $(d)Rune Ritual$(). This is required for empowering any rune.

pages.title: Preforming Rituals
pages.text: Once the ritual is setup according to the note, you can right click a $(d)Rune Catalyst$() on the center candle to empower it. This will yield a Rune of the corresponding type. Reference the Rune entry for crafting details.
